query: UPDATE blog_posts SET metaDescription = CONCAT(metaDescription, ' Professional career advice from All Resume Services, Australia''s trusted resume experts.'), updatedAt = NOW() WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) < 120 AND LENGTH(metaDescription) > 0;
